phrases.original: Note: If you have already followed the steps below, then your installation is complete. Just open the app from your Home screen, and you will no longer see these installation instructions.
phrases.translated: Note: If you have already followed the steps below, then your installation is complete. Just open the app from your Home screen, and you will no longer see these installation instructions.

phrases.original: Use the Google Chrome browser for best results.
phrases.translated: Use the Google Chrome browser for best results.

phrases.original: In the top right corner, click on the vertical 3 dots.
phrases.translated: In the top right corner, click on the vertical 3 dots.

phrases.original: A menu will appear.  Click on Add to Home screen, then follow the prompts.
phrases.translated: A menu will appear.  Click on Add to Home screen, then follow the prompts.

phrases.original: Note: Subsequent steps may vary, depending on your browser version.
phrases.translated: Note: Subsequent steps may vary, depending on your browser version.

phrases.original: If prompted, select the Install option (do not select 'Create shortcut').
phrases.translated: If prompted, select the Install option (do not select 'Create shortcut').

phrases.original: The Invites App will now appear on your device, alongside other installed apps.
phrases.translated: The Invites App will now appear on your device, alongside other installed apps.

phrases.original: If you prefer, you can now drag the icon for the Invites App onto your Home screen.
phrases.translated: If you prefer, you can now drag the icon for the Invites App onto your Home screen.

phrases.original: Go to your device's home screen and find the icon for the Invites App.
phrases.translated: Go to your device's home screen and find the icon for the Invites App.

phrases.original: You're done! From now on, just open the Invites app from your device's home screen.
phrases.translated: You're done! From now on, just open the Invites app from your device's home screen.
